Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Establishes the "save our small-business grant program" to aid certain small businesses impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic
Summary: Establishes the "save our small-business grant program" to aid certain small businesses impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง139-a, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the "save our small-business grant program" to aid certain small businesses impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
